content: The referral system in #Endgame is a great opportunity for those who are determined to earn rewards. By participating in the 7-year referral program, you will receive rewards for any purchases or sales made by your referred friends. Additionally, your referred friends will also receive a discount for 7 years. However, those who choose not to use the referral system will be charged the full price and taxes. The referral system dapp can be accessed at dapp.endgame.black.
